content.question: Which of the following best explains the change in the overall United States military presence in Vietnam between 1964 and 1968 as depicted in the graph?

choices.label: The belief that democratic governments needed to be protected from the influence of the Soviet Union
The fear that the North Vietnamese forces under Ho Chi Minh would spread communism in Asia
The concern that France was attempting to colonize Vietnam in opposition to international agreements
The reaction of the Lyndon Johnson administration to scandals over presidential authority

content.answer: The fear that the North Vietnamese forces under Ho Chi Minh would spread communism in Asia
